custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT race.* FROM gl_race race INNER JOIN ( SELECT gl_location.idRace idRace, gl_location.time_ time FROM gl_location ) location ON location.idRace = race.idRace WHERE (race.idUser = ?) AND (location.time BETWEEN ? AND ?)

SELECT race.* FROM gl_race race INNER JOIN ( SELECT gl_location.idRace idRace, gl_location.time_ time FROM gl_location ) location ON location.idRace = race.idRace WHERE (race.idUser = ?) AND location.time = ( SELECT MAX(location2.time_) FROM gl_location location2 INNER JOIN( SELECT gl_race.* FROM gl_race ) race2 ON location2.idRace = race2.idRace WHERE (race2.idUser = ?) )
